content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Recognition at EPAM India\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Pat on Back (POB) Awards\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - a performance-based award given to the associates on monthly basis. The winners are nominated by their managers for their performance in that particular month and winners receive monetary reward for the same. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":9462,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/43551c08-828b-4c64-89e4-af879cedad2a/pob.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/43551c08-828b-4c64-89e4-af879cedad2a/pob.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-left\",\"fileName\":\"pob.jpg\",\"name\":\"pob.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"43551c08-828b-4c64-89e4-af879cedad2a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":150,\"height\":150},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Anniversary Awards\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - awards to all associates celebrating 5, 10 or 15 year service anniversaries with EPAM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Memento Awards\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to associates.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Appreciation Week -\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Launched in June 2017, Appreciation Week is dedicated to recognizing the efforts of EPAMers and expressing gratitude by sharing badges through Heroes. Throughout the week, each day has a different theme and EPAMers share fun badges with their peers, managers and team. Appreciation Week helps reinforce our culture of recognition and EPAMers use this opportunity to take time to thank their colleagues. There was overwhelming participation during Appreciation Week and close to 2,015 badges were shared in a matter of five days. The initiative was widely welcomed by associates.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
